question: India and this country signs 7 agreements including one relating to land border crossing recently.
explanation: India & Myanmar have signed 7 agreements during the External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj's visit to Myanmar. The 7 agreements signed included one on land border crossing that will enable people from both countries to cross the land border with passport & visa for accessing health & education services. MoU on training of Myanmar foreign service officers was also signed during the meeting.
